title: Cutlass
description: A cutlass is a curved sword favored by sailors and swordsmen of Yom-Baria.

title: Two-Hander
description: A large sword that must be wielded two-handed.

title: The Sparrowhawk
description: A legendary rapier of unrivaled quality. It also adds +2 to the wielder’s initiative.

title: Ancient Dagger
description: An ancient dagger, carved from a strange greenish stone. It looks almost ritual and you suspect it might be of some value to someone with the right interest.

title: The Lake Blade
description: A stunningly wrought longsword of ancient design. The bluish sheen of its metal never seems to lose its luster giving it its name. You recovered this sword from the crypt under Horryn.
